data.title: The Anime Thread [Archiv]
data.meta_description:
In this thread we will talk about our favorite animes. :D 
 
 
For those who are new to this, I recommand the following articles: 
- Animes - Article from Wikipedia 
- Animes - Article from Otaku 
Anime: “A new type/style of drama in Japan which uses fictional, 2-D characters instead of real people, and has many different genres (Fantasy, Sci-Fi, Adventure, Comedy, Romance etc) and each Anime has is own suited, mostly not targeted age groups because of the varying elements of maturity within
